text: Hi all.  I wasn’t sure where to put this query, so hopefully the general channel is the right place…  I’d like to create a custom property that consists of two nested properties (a dropdown, and a number field).  Is there a way to achieve this?  If anyone knows of any apps on the marketplace that may be able to help me, or if there’s a way of being able to implement this myself, then some guidance will be greatly appreciated!  Thanks in advance.
Hello, we are testing calls using our integration, with the new calls feature we can't call contact without register a phone number as we use to do.
